title: I Want To Join PBE
body:
I Want To Join PBE !! I Stream At Youtube And Also On Twich TV. And I Make Many Videos.So For My Channel I Want To Join PBE How I Can Join???
I Already Register it. But Still It's Pending.
What Things I need For It???
Like All Champions Or What??{{summoner:11}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: The PBE is mostly intended to test new features and changes to get it ready for live, and not necessarily to showcase something.  If you're interesting in helping out the community through testing, you can sign up [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Best of luck with your application!
i registered my application 2 time but not responding
